Lace (2018) + Some Stuff I've Been Think.description: Talking about my piece [Lace](https://cwervo.com/lace/index.html) (2018) and thoughts on distributed rendering using the web.

VR & AR On The Web Using ClojureScript.description: An overview of how I added A-Frame to [CLJSJS](https://github.com/cljsjs/packages), creating functional VR using ClojureScript, and the future of the Immersive Web & AR for this approach.

Gray Area Incubator Artist Salon 2018.1.description: A 10 minute presentation about my screenless AR, speculative design project: _Lace_, the project I worked on as a member of the Gray Area Arts Incubator.

AR Art on the Web Using Wasm.description: A talk combining AR using [three.ar.js](https://github.com/google-ar/three.ar.js) and Rust via [WebAssembly](http://webassembly.org) to create AR art.

XR & Financial Accessibility.description: A talk at [the intersectional tech meetup](https://the-intersectional-tech-meetup.glitch.me/) (now [the critical tech meetup](https://critical-tech-meetup.glitch.me/)) in Berlin on why progressive enhacement in XR is the responsibe, finanicially accessible way to approach emerging tech like VR/AR/XR. The talk was not recorded but I created [a Twitter thread explaining many of the slides](https://twitter.com/acwervo/status/1012663331591729152)!

A Small Collection of My AR Art - And So.description: A talk given to students in an AR class at the [School of Machines, Making & Make-Believe](http://schoolofma.org/) on my AR artwork & ideas for making your own work!

Game Feel: Beyond Pictures Under Glass.description: A talk given at [Creative Mornings Oakland](https://creativemornings.com/cities/oak) on games, language, creativity, & the how the future of computing can facilitate all of that!

AR Comics & The Future of Augmented Art.description: A talk given at [SF Tech Poetics](https://www.facebook.com/SF-Tech-Poetics-1234662803267437/) on AR comics & the future of AR.

#ARctober.description: A talk about my #ARctober 2017 experiments at Mozilla SF for the [WebVR/AR Monthly Meetup Group](https://www.meetup.com/WebVR-AR-Monthly/)

Virtual Reality on the Web Using A-Frame.description: My talk at [Waffle.js](https://wafflejs.com/) about the A-Frame webVR framework.

Imagine Trees Like These.description: My Oberlin Senior creative writing Capstone (a VR narrative!)
